HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"The source of #blackpathology is that blacks never fought for or earned their liberation. It was GIVEN to them. Naturally, they resent this."
"Soft communists (SJWs) and the dindu-welfare-industrial-entertainment complex have destroyed Western civilization in less than a generation."
"A "Somali entrepreneur" is the guy who gets a subsidized minority loan to run the corner store where all his friends spend their EBT money."
"I asked my trainer which machine at the gym I should use to impress beautiful women... he pointed outside and said \"The ATM machine\""
"@NotHipsterToast trannies are disgusting abominations"
"\"Multiculturalism has always been animated by the left-wing resentment of, and hostility towards, the European inheritance\""
"Islam: A religion of violence that must be reconciled to peace. Christianity: A religion of peace that must be reconciled to violence."
"Citizenship policy: if you're a 3rd generation welfare recipient or 2nd generation felon, you're out. Also, if you're on welfare, no vote."
"Capitalism only works for the super elite, super greedy multinational treasoners! You all are just expendable sheep! #ResistCapitalism #Jews"
"The descendants of the first Western Europeans to halt the spread of Islam now mock the gravesites of their ancestors. #Prayers4Paris"
